title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.12 - Toilet installation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.12 - Toilet installation

State Regulations

Toilet facilities shall be installed in each retail food
store according to 9 NYCRR Part
901, shall be conveniently located and shall be
accessible to employees at all times. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.12

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
